summary: Rosemonde, known as "the Princess", reigns over a shanty town in Paris. She meets Herbert, a journalist, who comes to the region to investigate the pollution.
cast: Annie Girardot|Bernard Blier|Maurice Biraud|Roger Carel|Jean Carmet|Darry Cowl|Michel Galabru|André Pousse|Catherine Samie|Charles Southwood|Henri Attal|Daniel Prévost|Dominique Zardi|Yves Barsacq|Pierre Duncan|Carlo Nell|Bernard Musson|Jean Roquel|Albert Augier|Maurice Auzel|Mireille Franchino|Jacques Chauvière|Marcel Gassouk|Bernard Dumaine|Michel Duplaix|Jennifer Nichole Porter|Claude Rollet|Robert Vidalin|Cheik Doukouré|Roger Trapp|Jean-Louis Tristan
keywords: relic associated with jesus|beatnik|samba|religious relic|police raid
title: Milagro en París
